VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `view_renja_v3` AS select `ref_tahap_anggaran_v3`.`jenis_form_modul` AS `jenis_form_modul`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`status_validasi` AS `status_validasi`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`tanggal_validasi` AS `tanggal_validasi`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`user_validasi` AS `user_validasi`,`ref_modul`.`nama_modul` AS `nama_modul`,concat(`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`c1`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`c`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`d`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`e`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`e1`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`bk`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`ck`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`p`,'.',`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`q`) AS `urut`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`id_anggaran` AS `id_anggaran`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`jenis_anggaran` AS `jenis_anggaran`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`c1` AS `c1`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`c` AS `c`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`d` AS `d`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`e` AS `e`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`e1` AS `e1`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`bk` AS `bk`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`ck` AS `ck`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`p` AS `p`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`q` AS `q`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`jumlah` AS `jumlah`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`id_tahap` AS `id_tahap`,`detail_renja`.`capaian_program_tk` AS `target_kinerja`,`detail_renja`.`hasil_tuk` AS `hasil_tuk`,`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`sumber_dana` AS `sumber_dana`,`ref_tahap_anggaran_v3`.`no_urut` AS `no_urut` from (((`tabel_anggaran_v3` left join `detail_renja` on((`detail_renja`.`id_anggaran` = `tabel_anggaran_v3`.`id_anggaran`))) left join `ref_tahap_anggaran_v3` on((`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`id_tahap` = `ref_tahap_anggaran_v3`.`id_tahap`))) join `ref_modul` on((`tabel_anggaran_v3`.`nama_modul` = `ref_modul`.`nama_modul`))) where (`ref_modul`.`nama_modul` = 'RENJA')
